definitions: a person who dreams or is dreaming.
shortDefinitions: person who dreams or is dreaming

definitions: a person who is unpractical or idealistic
shortDefinitions: person who is unpractical or idealistic

definitions: a person who has lived in the US without official authorization since coming to the country as a minor. People of this description who met certain conditions would be eligible for a special immigration status under federal legislation first proposed in 2001
etymologies: from the initials of the Development, Relief, and Education for Alien Minors Act + -er

examples.text: she found out the Department of Transportation was not going to grant drivers' licenses to DREAMers

shortDefinitions: undocumented US resident who came to country as child
